alert.note: Alert for Central and Southern Lewis and Clark (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 3:49PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Lewis and Clark County through 415 PM MDT... At 349 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 16 miles southeast of Lincoln, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Canyon Creek. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM MDT for west central Montana.
